metadata.name: Ethereal Hand
metadata.description:
"Ethereal Hand" animation loop is my first NFT on the Ethereum blockchain, part of the Mel Dream collection. 

As a long time artist transitioning into the web3 space for the first time, this represents my desire to grasp the digital landscape of art and collection. As surreal as everything is to me, I hope this animation captures this eternal moment in my new career into the metaverse.
